goal:
Loyal Advisory is a management consulting firm established to provide organizations with the stakeholder centric framework.

Loyal Advisory aims to identify and to create shared value between clients and stakeholders.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Youth
